General.Name: Estoril Sol SGPS SA
General.Description: Estoril Sol, SGPS, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the gaming activities and real estate businesses. It owns gaming casinos, including casino do Estoril, Casino Lisboa, and Casino da Póvoa. It is also involved in the online casino games and gambling business, as well as online sports betting activities. In addition, it owns a plot of land in Monte Estoril. Further, the company engages in tourism business. The company was incorporated in 1958 and is headquartered in Estoril, Portugal. Estoril Sol, SGPS, S.A. is a subsidiary of Finansol - Sociedade de Controlo, SGPS, S.A.
General.Address: EdifIcio do Casino Estoril, Estoril, Portugal, 2765-190
